main event: Military and civilian personnel observed a luminous object traveling at high speed, changing color from white to orange, at Tyndall AFB, Florida and New Orleans, Louisiana on November 8, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a basketball and traveling at an estimated speed of 500 mph or greater., The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes., The object was visible for about 3 minutes before disappearing., The observers noted the object was moving in a very narrow path and was illuminated for just a few seconds., The sighting was reported by both military and civilian personnel at the same time in two different locations.
sighted object: luminous object changing color from white to orange
